mapper.insert: insert into carts(cart_id, pr_id, mem_id, count, total_price) values(carts_seq.nextval, #{pr_id}, #{mem_id}, #{count}, #{total_price})
mapper.select: select p.pr_name pr_name, p.price price, p.image image, p.context context, c.count count, c.total_price total_price, c.cart_id cart_id from carts c inner join products p on c.pr_id = p.pr_id where c.mem_id = #{mem_id} order by cart_id desc
